We may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience and track usage patterns on our website. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or rent personal information to third parties. Information may be shared with trusted service providers to facilitate our operations. We may disclose information in response to legal requests, to protect our rights and safety, or as required by law. Data Security We implement security measures to protect personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Users should take precautions to protect their personal information. Access and Control Users have the right to access, update, or delete their personal information. They can also opt-out of receiving communications from us. Users can exercise these rights by contacting us through the provided contact information. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that personal information from a child under 13 has been collected, we will take steps to delete it as soon as possible. Updates to Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update our privacy policy periodically. Users will be notified of any changes through our website or other communication channels. It is the responsibility of users to review this policy regularly for any updates. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. Users should review the privacy policies of third-party sites before providing any personal information. International Data Transfer Personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of the user's country of residence. By using our services, users consent to such transfers. We will take appropriate measures to ensure the security of personal information during international transfers. Retention of Data We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. Users can request the deletion of their personal information in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. User Consent By using our website and services, users consent to the terms of this privacy policy and the collection, use, and disclosure of their personal information as described herein. Users have the right to withdraw their consent at any time by contacting us. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach that may compromise the security of personal information, we will notify affected users as required by law and take appropriate measures to mitigate the impact of the breach. Users will be informed of the nature of the breach, the information compromised, and the steps taken to address the issue. Contact us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at adcrafters@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and transparently.
